attributes.action: School weeks should be reduced from 5 days to 4 days in england.
attributes.additional_details: Easter holidays are not enough for revision as i have to revise for 28 topics for my end of year exams and it has been very stressful since I have to revise 7 hours a day. I'm starting to feel like an introvert because i dont leave my room just revising. As I'm a muslim ramadan meets easter holidays this year, fasting and revising at the same time is a problem and im writing this on 2:55 am because i just finished revision and im still not confident enough about the end of yeas exams.
attributes.background: I want the government to reduce 5 school days a week to 4 school days a week in england so students and teachers could get more time with family and to give students and teachers more free time to release stress. As i experience 5 school days a week it's very stressful.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614046
